typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'southridge',
	folderPath: 'CloudSales',
	fileName: 'dbo.Customers.txt',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true) ~> CloudSalesCustomers
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'southridge',
	folderPath: 'CloudStreaming',
	fileName: 'dbo.Customers.txt',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true) ~> CloudStreamingCustomers
CloudSalesCustomers, CloudStreamingCustomers union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 derive(CreatedDateTMS = toDate(byName('CreatedDate'))) ~> DerivedColumn1
